Methods

ToBool(AppStoredProgram, string)

Evaluates an expression and converts the result to a boolean value.

public static bool ToBool(AppStoredProgram program, string expr)

Parameters

program AppStoredProgram

The active stored program.

expr string

The expression to evaluate.

Returns

bool

The evaluated boolean value.

Exceptions

CommandException

Thrown if the expression cannot be converted to a boolean.
